Defender Stunning Fist: May stun struck foe (DC 21 Fort neg) for 1 rd 23/dy

One With The Weapon: May use Masterful Strike, Precise Strike, or Stunning Fist w/chosen weapon
Precise Strike: Ignores 9 points of foe DR
Quick: +1 attack w/light weapons
Rapid Strike: May make an extra attack at highest attack bonus 1/rd
Retaliatory Strike: May make AOO vs. a foe that strikes an ally 1/rd
Speed Training: May make an extra move action each rd
Strike And Hold: May make an extra unarmed attack to grab foe
Weapon Trap: Successful attack to grab foe weapon allows choice of Disarm, damage, or AOO 1/rd

Remove Blindness/Deafness (Healer3 Conj): Heals touched of blindness or deafness
Remove Disease (Healer3 Conj): Cures touched of all diseases
Restoration (Healer4 Conj): Dispels magical ability harm from touched and heals all temporary ability damage, restores 1 drained ability, removes fatigue or exhaustion and temporary negative levels, and restores 1 drained level
